title: Bug 24779[Perspectives] Reference to invalid views are not removed
description: Bug 24779[Perspectives] Reference to invalid views are not removed It already tried, and it can't.8.
OB: Currently, even when the plugin is not available, Eclipse retains references to invalid views.
EB: The plugin was not available the last time Eclipse was closed, so the workbench should have no more references to this plugin.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Close Eclipse with the plugin unavailable.
2. Reopen Eclipse and check if there are any references to the missing plugin in the perspectives or views.
